text: "Take the Money and Run" is a 1976 song by Steve Miller Band. It was taken from their ninth studio album Fly Like an Eagle. It went to number 8 in Canada, number 11 in the United States, number 48 in Australia and number 57 in the United Kingdom. It was been covered by country singer Julian Austin in 2000. == References == Category:1976 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Steve Miller Band songs Category:Julian Austin (musician) songs
title: Take the Money and Run (Steve Miller Band song)
